form.label: Stream Information
form.description: Provides information about streams and whether a contacted external endpoint might serve ads or malicious content.

search.query: $source_token$ | fields traffic_analyzer_stream, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, frame_len, threat_category, ad_category, _* | table traffic_analyzer_stream, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, frame_len, threat_category, ad_category, _time
sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/capture\-(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource | sort shortSource

| eventstats sum(frame_len) as "Bytes transfered" by traffic_analyzer_stream | table "Bytes transfered", _time, traffic_analyzer_stream, ws_col_Protocol, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, threat_category, ad_category | eventstats last(_time) as last_event, first(_time) as first_event by traffic_analyzer_stream | eval Timespan=round(first_event-last_event,3) | dedup traffic_analyzer_stream | table traffic_analyzer_stream, "Bytes transfered", Timespan, ws_col_Protocol, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, threat_category, ad_category | eval threat_category=if(threat_category="",0,split(threat_category,",")) | mvexpand threat_category | join ad_category [ search sourcetype="list" source="*ad*" | table id, category | rename id as ad_category, category AS adcategory ] | join threat_category [ search sourcetype="list" source="*threat*" | table id, category | rename id as threat_category, category as threatcategory ] | table traffic_analyzer_stream, "Bytes transfered", Timespan, ws_col_Protocol, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, adcategory, threatcategory | mvcombine threatcategory | rename traffic_analyzer_stream as "Stream ID", ws_col_Protocol as "Protocol", ip_src_combined as "Source IP", ip_dst_combined as "Destination IP", adcategory as "Ad Category", threatcategory as "Threat Category"
